Hi Britt,

See: https://scribehow.com/shared/Access_Form_Submissions_via_Breakdance_in_investmenttrendscom__r43nkaAAQcmrENtIih3a4w

Hi Britt,

It seems that you are editing from IT Resources which is different from the page itself. If you would like to edit the text on the page, navigate to Pages then look for the page or click this Webinar: Navigating the Cost of Living Crisis in the UK then click on Edit in Breakdance button.

Here's a guide to help you:
https://scribehow.com/shared/Edit_Webinar_Navigating_the_Cost_of_Living_Crisis_in_the_UK_page__wuSjxg6-Sa6tXxL38SkSdQ

Let us know if you need further assistance.

action.text: Jaime Velasquez assigned to Glen Tenorio
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi there,

We'd like to make a couple of changes/additions to the website, please see details below:

Update 1:

  • Add new tab to the Resources page
  • Tab to be called Webinars
  • Webinars tab to be last in order (after Videos)
  • New tile to be created, same functionality/set up as Spotlight On tile
  • Button to read 'WATCH WEBINAR'
  • Button to click through to new website URL
  • Example attached (webinars-mockup)

Update 2:

  • New page type to be called 'Webinars'
  • Page content/layout example attached (webinars-mockup2)
  • When the 'Watch webinar' button is clicked a pop up form will appear asking for their First Name, Last Name, Country and Email (to work like this example https://www.bravurasolutions.com/2018/06/06/smith-williamson-deliver-a-fully-integrated-in-house-service/#)
  • Once the user has filled out their details they will be able to watch the webinar video (can the video appear/download in a new tab?)
  • The purpose of this is so that the content is gated and people can only access if they share their contact details
  • When the 'Get access to the report' button is clicked, link to the contact us page https://investmenttrends.com/about-us/contact/

Please let me know if you have any questions or need further explanation on any of the above 😊

Thanks,
Britt

Brittany Tan
Senior Marketing Manager
P +61 2 8248 8000
Level 6, 143 Macquarie Street | Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
investmenttrends.com
